properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the board

properties.name: owner
properties.description: The user ID in Wekan. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Whether to set the board active

properties.name: isAdmin
properties.description: Whether to set the owner an admin of the board

properties.name: isCommentOnly
properties.description: Whether to enable comments

properties.name: isNoComments
properties.description: Whether to disable comments

properties.name: isWorker
properties.description: Whether to only move cards, assign himself to card and comment

properties.name: boardId
properties.description: The ID of the board to delete

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a new board

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete a board

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get the data of a board

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many user boards

properties.name: listId
properties.description: The ID of the list that card belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: cardId
properties.description: The ID of the card. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: authorId
properties.description: The user who posted the comment. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: The comment text

properties.name: commentId
properties.description: The ID of the comment to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: swimlaneId
properties.description: The swimlane ID of the new card. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: description
properties.description: The new description of the card

properties.name: members
properties.description: The new list of member IDs attached to the card. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Update the owner of the card. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: assignees
properties.description: The new list of assignee IDs attached to the card. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: dueAt
properties.description: The new due at field of the card

properties.name: endAt
properties.description: The new end at field of the card

properties.name: labelIds
properties.description: The label IDs attached to the card

properties.name: isOverTime
properties.description: The new over time field of the card

properties.name: parentId
properties.description: The parent of the card. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: receivedAt
properties.description: The new received at field of the card

properties.name: sort
properties.description: The internally used sort value of a card

properties.name: spentTime
properties.description: The new spent time field of the card

properties.name: startAt
properties.description: The new start at field of the card

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a card

properties.name: items
properties.description: Items to be added to the checklist

properties.name: checklistId
properties.description: The ID of the checklist to delete. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: checklistItemId
properties.description: The ID of the checklistItem item to get. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: isFinished
properties.description: Whether the item is checked
